projects.title: Rocket Simulator
projects.description: Using current weather forecasts, we run a RocketPy simulation that continuously calculates the trajectory of the 2025 Propulse rocket, providing a live prediction of its flight path.

projects.title: Propulse
projects.description: Propulse is a student-driven initiative that aims to send a liquid filled rocket to space. Currently I'm working on the software for the engine.

projects.title: Formula Website
projects.description: An easy way to look up formulas for physics and math. The website lets a person search the variables of their problem to find a fitting formula.

projects.title: Complexity NTNU
projects.description: Complexity NTNU is a student led organization that aims to build AI projects. The website was created by me.

projects.title: Latex Renderer
projects.description: A simple LaTeX renderer that can be used to render LaTeX code to images, both with a white background or a transparent background.

projects.title: Delta Beer Shop
projects.description: A streamlined system with card-scanning login for quick access and a backend to manage member funds and inventory prices.

projects.title: Search Shortcut
projects.description: Created the Universal Search Bar Shortcut Chrome extension, enabling a consistent keyboard shortcut to activate any website's search bar for faster, more efficient browsing.
